item.title: Elon Musk promises robotaxi will be ready and available by the end of 2026
item.description:
How It Started on 2024-10-10

Elon promised that the robotaxi, named Cybercab, would be ready and available in two years from now. I’m generous, I will give him until end of December 2026. The second claim he made was that it would cost under $30,000.

item.title: Elon Musk claims Tesla will reveal its robotaxi in October (2024?)
item.description:
How It Started on 2024-07-28

Elon previously claimed he would reveal the robotaxi on August 8th, 2024, but backpedaled during the earnings call.

item.title: Elon Musk claims Tesla will reveal its robotaxi on August 8th (2024?)
item.description:
How It Started on 2024-04-05

On April 5, 2024, Elon posted a Tweet on Xitter saying that Tesla will reveal its robotaxi on August 8th. He did not mention which year, but everyone makes the assumption it is 2024. Source: The Verge
